text: “allāh pahaḷa karana lada dæya (dharmaya) desaṭada, (ohugē) dutayā desaṭada, pæmiṇenu” yayi kiyanu læbuvahot “apagē mutun mittan kumak mata siṭiyōdæyi api duṭuvemuda, eyama (api anugamanaya kirīma) apaṭa pramāṇavatya” yayi pavasannāha. ovungē mutun mittan kisivak nodænagena ṛju mārgayehi nomætiva siṭiyat vuvada, (ovun tama mutun mittanva anugamanaya karannē)
